text: The great Empire of Man exists as little more than a pack of squabbling animals, power-hungry Electors and their backwards peoples desperate to better themselves at the cost of their neighbors. None would admit to betraying their Emperor, of course. But in every one of their rancid hearts lies one simple thought - "I could rule better." A seed that, if watered and nurtured, can grow into something great and terrible.
